quote: Beauty begins the moment you decide to be yourself.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Self-care is giving the world the best of you, not what's left of you.
author: Katie Reed

quote: The best color in the whole world is the one that looks good on you.
author: Coco Chanel

quote: Beauty is power; a smile is its sword.
author: John Ray

quote: Invest in your hair, it's the crown you never take off.
author: Unknown

quote: Glow is the essence of beauty.
author: Estee Lauder

quote: Outer beauty pleases the eye. Inner beauty captivates the heart.
author: Mandy Hale

quote: When you feel good, you look good.
author: Victoria Beckham

quote: Your beauty is defined by you and no one else.
author: Unknown

quote: Beauty is not in the face; beauty is a light in the heart.
author: Kahlil Gibran
